                 int detectRadius,
                 int eggCycle,
                 int carnivorePoints,
                 double energy,
                 double metabolism,
                 long chaseLength)
        Herbivore constructor
        Parameters:
        pos - position
        angle - angle
        speed - speed
        detectRadius - radius of detection to search for food
        eggCycle - time till hatching of eggs laid
        carnivorePoints - carinivore points of herbivore
        energy - energy of herbivore
        metabolism - speed of energy use, metabolism
        chaseLength - time until carnivore gives up chase of a herbivore
